title: PES,RR ECE vs VIT,Vellore ECE
content:
I got ECE in VIT,Vellore and have a possibility to get ECE in PES RR campus. 
Any suggestions on the better option between these two will be helpful.

comments.body: Choose vit ece over pesu..vit has better brand value as compared to pesu

if anyone posts a "\_\_\_ vs \_\_\_\_" post again I'm gonna lose my shit chat

please mods, save us
Yes vit is NIRF 12 we are in sub 100s
Lmao what brand value? Neither has any competitive edge.

Any college is better than VIT

Choose PES
Do this if you wanna have a college considering 4+ LPA as tier 1 placement ðŸ˜‚
